duties_responsibilities.duty: Sell software maintenance agreements (SMA’s) to end-users across the Americas territory primarily through outbound and inbound telephone sales activities.
Work with the software product specialists to acquire new customers and retain and grow the existing installed base of customers.
Manage own sales funnel and proactively seek out business opportunities via Marcom or other creative business initiatives.
Regularly communicate deals, issues, and opportunities with relevant specialists.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors or Masters Degree in a technical field of Chemistry or Biology
